Hi.

I have 2 issues about budgetting

1. Would it be problematic to move: "wq.expend(getCost(curi))";
    from WorkQueueFrontier.noteAboutToEmit(..)
    to WorkQueueFrontier.finished(..) - just below: "if (curi.isSuccess()) {"

2. should WorkQueue.refund() not just always refund this.lastCost() ?

best
